comment._content: She looks like a young Aunt Bee.

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: This is Mary Boomer Page, a Chicago-based educator who led summer tours of Europe for educators. c. 1907. Mary Boomer Page was a member of the Chicago local board of the International Kindergartners' Union in 1901, according to the New York Tribune (11 April 1901). She also served on the Finance Committee of the Union, and as president of the Kindergarten Literature Company. She was a resident director at the Gertrude House settlement, which was in turn the location of the Chicago Kindergarten Institute.

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Boomer_Page
